metadata.description:
Collects Peter Parker: Spider-Man (1999) #156.1, Sensational Spider-Man (1996) #33.1 & #33.2 and Web Of Spider-Man (1985) #129.1 & #129.2.

Celebrating 50 years of great responsibility! Spanning from his earliest days as a hero to the heyday of the heralded Big Time era and everything in between, a collection of Marvel Legends, venerated comic creators and awe-inspiring artists shine the spotlight on everything that makes Spider-Man the World's Greatest Super Hero!
metadata.name: Spider-Man: World's Greatest Hero
